    • Constructor Detail

      • Simulation

        public Simulation(int minArrival,
          int maxArrival,
          int queuesNb,
          int simulationStart,
          int simulationEnd,
          int minServiceTime,
          int maxServiceTime)
        Builds simulation of a queues that process clients
        Parameters:
        minArrival - - minimum time between arrival of two customers
        maxArrival - - maximum time between arrival of two customers
        queuesNb - - maximum number of open Servers to process clients
        simulationStart - - the time from which the simulation starts, expressed in minutes
        simulationEnd - - the time at which the simulation end, expressed in minutes
        minServiceTime - - the minimum amount of time that a customer may require processing
        maxServiceTime - - the maximum amount of time that a customer may require processing

        public int getMaxQueNumber()

        Returns:
        id of the queue with maximum waiting time

      • arrangeServers

        public void arrangeServers()
        Opens servers if the maximum waiting time is exceeded by any of the queues. Closes the servers that do not meet the minimum waiting time When a server is opened, all clients in queues are rearranged, in the order that they arrived.

      • peakHourMesage

        public java.lang.String peakHourMesage()
        Finds the value of the hour that had the most clients. The method returns a message with the peak hour
        Returns:
        a String containing a printable message that says the peak hour
